SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.dtos

Class CourseDTO

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.dtos.CourseDTO
public class CourseDTO extends Object
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a course. Encapsulates essential details required for course creation and management.
